posts.post_content:
I've decided to go all out on my N172 project, so my Sox cards must go. All prices include shipping. PayPal prefered, personal checks (must clear before card(s) ship) and USPS money orders accepted.

[url]jason_carota@comcast.net[/url]

SOLD - T205 Ed Karger - $55

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/Deadball%20Era%20Red%20Sox/t205_1911_piedmont_f25_karger.jpg[/IMG]

SOLD - T201 Cicotte/Thoney - $30

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/Deadball%20Era%20Red%20Sox/t201_1911_cicotte_thoney.jpg[/IMG]


Thanks for looking!

I will take Cicotte.
              Thanks,
                 Steve
I know almost nothing about the T201s but that Cicotte is pretty sweet and would have been in my price range foe a guy I want to pick up. Wish I'd have seen this one earlier. Congrats soxinseven ;)
